```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

First, we load the needed libraries.
```{r, echo=T, results='hide'}
library(datasets)
library(rDML)
```

We will use the iris dataset.
```{r}
# Loading dataset
data(iris)
X = iris[1:4]
y = as.array(as.numeric(iris[5][,1]))
```

The DML algorithms we will use:
```{r}
nca = dml$NCA()
lda = dml$LDA()
```

```{r}
  f = dml_plotter$knn_plot(X[1:2],y,k = 3,dml = nca, cmap = "rainbow")
  #f$show()
```
